listitem.para: Unminimizes (restores) the window whose title matches caption. The term "ICON" comes from the old days when Windows applications were minimized into small icons.
The term "caption" is not the same as the window's "name" used in the WINDOWS functions.

programlisting.userinput:
TO HIDEANDSHOW ICON "FMSLogo WAIT 120 UNICON "FMSLogo END
HIDEANDSHOW
